typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{odata.etag} as string,
		ItemInternalId as string,
		ID as integer,
		Title as string,
		N_x0028__x0025_p_x002f_p_x0029_ as double,
		Modified as string,
		Created as string,
		Author as ({odata.type} as string, Claims as string, DisplayName as string, Email as string, Picture as string, Department as string, JobTitle as string),
		{Author#Claims} as string,
		Editor as ({odata.type} as string, Claims as string, DisplayName as string, Email as string, Picture as string, Department as string, JobTitle as string),
		{Editor#Claims} as string,
		Identifier as string,
		IsFolder as boolean,
		Thumbnail as (Large as string, Medium as string, Small as string),
		Link1 as string,
		Name as string,
		FilenameWithExtension as string,
		Path as string,
		FullPath as string,
		HasAttachments as boolean,
		VersionNumber as string,
		K2O_x0028__x0025_p_x002f_p_x0029 as double,
		P2O5_x0028__x0025_p_x002f_p_x002 as double,
		B_x0028__x0025_p_x002f_p_x0029_ as double,
		CaO_x0028__x0025_p_x002f_p_x0029 as double,
		Zn_x0028_NO3_x0029_2_x0028__x002 as double,
		MgO_x0028__x0025_p_x002f_p_x0029 as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		Title,
		N_x0028__x0025_p_x002f_p_x0029_,
		K2O_x0028__x0025_p_x002f_p_x0029,
		P2O5_x0028__x0025_p_x002f_p_x002,
		B_x0028__x0025_p_x002f_p_x0029_,
		CaO_x0028__x0025_p_x002f_p_x0029,
		Zn_x0028_NO3_x0029_2_x0028__x002,
		MgO_x0028__x0025_p_x002f_p_x0029
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Seleccionar1
Seleccionar1 unpivot(output(
		Compuesto as string,
		Valor as double
	),
	ungroupBy(Title),
	lateral: false,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> anulardinamizacion
anulardinamizacion alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> Modificarfila1
Modificarfila1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		idFertilizante as integer,
		Nombre as string,
		Compuesto as string,
		Valor as double
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['truncate table dbo.ThFertilizante'],
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Nombre = Title,
		Compuesto,
		Valor
	)) ~> sink1
